name: Pinata
info: The IPFS module allows you to store data to the IPFS p2p network via the SimpleID node. A content hash will be returned so that you can provide it to your users, but you can also query your content and fetch it directly.

name: Blockstack
info: The Blockstack module uses Blockstack's Gaia storage and provides a high-performance cloud solution. Unless your users have deployed their own Gaia storage hub, this module makes use of SimpleID's default hub.
